sub_title: Senior Payments Communications Specialist at Booking.com
summary:
Entrepreneurial young professional with experience in communications; 
and 8-year-long progressive experience at one of the world’s leading digital travel companies: Booking.com. Highly passionate about assessing communication needs of my customers and developing strategies in response to those needs. Making my customers feel well supported and empowered to excel in their jobs.

[{'company': {'id': 11348, 'name': 'Booking.com', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEgzF5azm3fNA/company-logo_400_400/0/1628510256914?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=oaxCkHySuLgrEFLXxw_Q9XDv1cHJeWHoyplnre8Oexo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/booking.com/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Booking.com', 'description': '- Strong focus on customer relationship management and community management

- Acting as a mediator and closely collaborating with teams across the business to support communication needs (FinTech Product, B2B Communications, PR, Legal, Business Continuity Operations and Finance)
- Designing and implementing communication content to support each relevant target group with the necessary information 
- Driving and developing creative ideas to promote and strengthen the department brand (Q&A sessions, interviews, newsletters)
- Analyzing the needs of all stakeholders for an event in collaboration with internal management
- Designing and developing training & workshop concepts to educate stakeholders
